trends: There have been no other sightings in Shiloh
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details i just now discovered this "agency" (mufon) where i can report this. that is why it was so long ago. the date and time i've given are estimations. the date is within a week (give or take a few days) of this occurance. the time, is relatively close because this happened near dusk. it was still light outside, but just beginning to get dark. i was driving down st. rt. 603 south between plymouth, oh 44865 and shiloh, oh 44878. there is a large "s" curve in the road about 1.5 miles outside shiloh. when i saw this "object\light" in the sky i was about .5 miles before that curve. while i was driving, i looked up and saw this amazingly bright green light just hovering in the sky. it seemed to be a mile or so away from me, given it was in the sky; but i really don't know how far away it was. this was not something normal to be seen around here. it was not a plane or balloon, or anything like that. it was the brightest neon green i've ever seen in my life. it was shaped like the planet saturn. round for the most part, but a lot wider in the middle like the rings on saturn. as i was driving i slowed down (but didn't stop) to see this "object". it was there in the sky for about 20 seconds, and then vanished. but it was just hovering there, not moving at all. then like that it was gone. it kind of startled me to see this, because i'd never seen anything like it before. it gave me the chills, and i thought of the possibility of a ufo. i continued driving to shiloh. ( i was headed to a friends house at the time) when i got there i told my friend what i had seen in the sky. when i was telling him about it i was excited, but also nervous. it was just one of the weirdest things that i'd ever seen. i hope to see something like this again someday.
Summary: Bright green object hovering in the sky
